reset_conf.text: Are you sure you want to reset data?

restart_conf.text: Are you sure you want to restart?

quit_conf.text: Are you sure you want to quit?

tutorial_1.text:
Tap here to
launch an orb.

tutorial_2.text:
Good! Tap here to
launch another orb.

tutorial_3.text:
Tap the slinger
to swap orbs.

tutorial_4.text:
Make matches of 3
or more like colored orbs.

tutorial_5.text:
Excellent! Pop the remaining
orbs to continue.

tutorial_6.text:
You have received a powerup.
For every three consequential
matches, you get a powerup!
3x, 6x, 9x and so on!
Try shooting it!

tutorial_7.text:
Clear this last wave
to end the tutorial.

feature_1.text:
Play more than 90 exciting levels in this
fantastic bubble game.

feature_2.text: Choose from 3 game modes and use 16 different enchantments.

feature_3.text:
Check your book of achievements for statistics like your quest progress
and the amount of levels you've won.

feature_4.text:
Earn achievements for popping 10,000 orbs, collecting three power-ups
in 5 seconds, and more.
